title.text: 2022-12 Dynamic Cumulative Update for Windows 10 Version 21H1 for x86-based Systems (KB5021233)

description.text: ComponentUpdate: A security issue has been identified in a Microsoft software product that could affect your system. You can help protect your system by installing this update from Microsoft. For a complete listing of the issues that are included in this update, see the associated Microsoft Knowledge Base article. After you install this update, you may have to restart your system.
